Dear President Xi
    I'm LiHua. I'm sorry about what's happened recently......
    Academy City is an open and inclusive city......Foreign forces are full of prejudice against us......
    Only our students have the best say in our affairs......Academy City's affairs must not be pointed the finger by other forces......
    I am looking forward to hearing form you.
                                                                                                        yours
                                                                                                        LiHua
